dc:title: On Pilgrimage - December 1957
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Account of a trip through Chicago, Minnesota, and onto Montreal. Comments on the interest of students in pacifism, singing psalms in English, riding the bus, and prayer--"A fundamental study."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 733 1957-12-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
